summary: This release completes the GroveAuth integration, so you can now sign in directly from the landing page. It adds posting limits and switches all backend calls to the new auth-api service. Also fixed a few Svelte 5 quirks and added the Quicksand font.

features: add Quicksand font to landing site
add posting limits and GroveAuth integration scaffolding (#45)
Add sign-in functionality to landing page
fixes: Use auth-api.grove.place for all API calls
Add error display and debug logging for auth failures
Use $derived for error state in Svelte 5 runes mode
docs: Mark Google Sign-In and post limits as done via GroveAuth
